accommodation.name: Powderhorn Chateau
accommodation.description: Combining all the facilities typical of a hotel with the ambience of a friendly lodge, the Powderhorn Chateau is situated at the base of Mt Ruapehu in close proximity to the spectacular Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Posh Pioneers
accommodation.description: After almost 50 years of working and holidaying in this remote area of New Zealand, we bought a block of land. We now have 6 pioneer-style accommodation wagons furnished with antique beds and luxurious bedding that we want to share with local Kiwis.

accommodation.name: Sno Ruapehu
accommodation.description: Sno Ruapehu is a contemporary new build at the edge of Horopito and Tongariro National Park, Sno Ruapehu waits to welcome you.

accommodation.name: Rimu Park Apartments
accommodation.description: Rimu Park Apartments are situated at the foothills of Mt Ruapehu, offering great access to the Tongaririo National Park for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, mountain biking & fishing. We are operational all year round.

accommodation.name: Rimu Park Mountain Lodge
accommodation.description: Rimu Park Mountain Lodge is situated at the foothills of Mt Ruapehu, offering great access to the Tongaririo National Park for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, mountain biking & fishing. We are operational all year round.

accommodation.name: Blackfern Cottage
accommodation.description: Blackfern Cottage is located at 50 Ongarue Village Road, Ongarue - perfect to stay the night before, or the night after your Timber Trail Adventure, or a handy stop over to the ski fields.

accommodation.name: The Ohakune Central Motel
accommodation.description: The Ohakune Central Motel and Lodge is located in downtown Ohakune, just few minutes walk from the main bus stop, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.

accommodation.name: Two Rivers Ohakune
accommodation.description: Quiet location but only a 10 min stroll to town by road or riverside walk. Private, warm, double glazed rooms with ensuite shower room. Hydrotherapy spa, free WIFI, mountain views, drying room, storage shed, off street parking, continental breakfast.

accommodation.name: Twin Rivers Motel
accommodation.description: In the heart of King Country, Twin Rivers Motel lies at the confluence of the Ongarue and Whanganui rivers in Taumarunui, and is perfectly positioned at the gateway to the awe-inspiring Ruapehu District.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Suites
accommodation.description: Located on the edge of Tongariro National Park, Tongariro Suites offers Premium Boutique Accommodation. Every one of our four suites has stunning Mt Ruapehu views. Opened in March 2014 we offer fresh and modern accommodation in the Ohakune region.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Springs Boutique Suites
accommodation.description: Tongariro Springs is small private accommodation beside Tongariro National Park. Ideally placed for the Tongariro Alpine Crossing, the Northern Circuit and the Mount Ruapehu Ski Season. Our scenic outdoor Hot Pool & Spa Pool are as unique as we are.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Crossing Lodge
accommodation.description: A family-run boutique lodge, Tongariro Crossing Lodge caters for travelers seeking personal attention in a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Our spacious and comfortable rooms offer a unique retreat in which to relax and recharge.

accommodation.name: Parkview Apartments
accommodation.description: Featuring panoramic views of Tongariro National Park from floor-to-ceiling windows, Parkview Apartments offers a modern, self-catering holiday home with a fully-equipped kitchen & laundry. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the house.

accommodation.name: The Old Post Office Lodge
accommodation.description: Step back in time staying at the beautifully renovated iconic Owhango Post Office, with it's 7-Bedrooms, two kitchen-dining, gorgeous art-deco gatsby-style decor, plus drying room cupboard, gun safe, hot tub, sauna & firepit.

accommodation.name: Nightsky Cottage
accommodation.description: Night Sky Cottage is designed to offer a true 5-star, eco-focussed, New Zealand protected native bush experience. The cottage is set in 1-ha of protected native Manuka and Beech Tree bush and is accessible via a 50 meter boardwalk.

accommodation.name: Forgotten World Motel
accommodation.description: Forgotten World Motel is situated in central Taumarunui near to all amenities. With a supermarket over the road, and just a short stroll to the shopping centre, restaurants and cafes, it is the best place to begin exploring the Forgotten World.

accommodation.name: Ohakune TOP 10 Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Ohakune TOP 10 Holiday Park is the perfect base from which to discover the Central North Island with Mt. Ruapehu, Mt. Ngauruhoe and Mt. Tongariro and the Whanganui River National Park.

accommodation.name: Pipers Lodge
accommodation.description: Pipers Lodge is a family owned and operated business designed to accommodate families,groups or individuals. We have an in-house bar and dining area for breakfasts and dinner. Ski hire,games room and 3 spa pools for your comfort.

accommodation.name: Discovery Lodge
accommodation.description: Hello, we would love to have you stay with us and experience the amazing piece of pure New Zealand wilderness that is Tongariro.

accommodation.name: LKNZ Lodge & Backpackers
accommodation.description: LKNZ lodge situated right on the doorstep of the Tongariro National Park is located in the township of Ohakune, with supermarket, restaurants, bars and shops all within a 2 minute walk. LKNZ provides quality accommodation to suit all budgets.

accommodation.name: Golden Fern Backpackers
accommodation.description: Turangi the gateway to the Tongariro National Park, with daily transport to the Tongariro Crossing, Northern Circuit Mt Ruapehu (ski fields) and Kaimanawa ranges. Enjoy your stay in dorm, share, double or twin rooms with private or shared bathrooms.

accommodation.name: Taumarunui Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Situated in the beautiful, rugged Ruapehu District, on the banks of the Whanganui River with trout fishing, swimming, canoeing and nature walks close by.

accommodation.name: Chateau Tongariro Hotel
accommodation.description: Chateau Tongariro Hotel believe in providing visitors with a timeless elegance and believe in preserving history and tradition.

accommodation.name: Manowhenua Lodge
accommodation.description: Whether you're looking for somewhere to relax after skiing, need to put your feet up after walking the Tongariro Alpine Crossing, or taking a day to recover from your adventures in the Central Plateau, Manowhenua Lodge is just the place for you.

accommodation.name: Bachcare Holiday Homes in Ruapehu
accommodation.description: Find your happy place in Ruapehu
accommodation.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Autumn leaves framing Mt Ruapehu in Ohakune - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=240&height=160&rmode=crop

accommodation.name: National Park Backpackers
accommodation.description: Backpackers lodge built around an indoor rock climbing hall, great views of the 3 volcanoes in the Central North Island (Mt Tongariro, Mt Ngauruhoe and Mt Ruapehu) right from our doorstep. All year destination: hiking in summer - snowsports in winter

accommodation.name: Manuka Lodge
accommodation.description: Bed & Breakast at its best. Manuka Lodge offers top of the range hotel style rooms in a relaxed and tranquil setting. Resting in the shadow of Mt Ruapehu it's the perfect retreat from which to enjoy the unique and spectacular Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: The Crossing Backpackers
accommodation.description: Located between Whakapapa and Turoa ski fields for the winter we also provide an ideal base for the Tongariro Alpine Crossing with transport options available.

accommodation.name: Skotel Alpine Resort
accommodation.description: Skotel Alpine Resort is located in the heart of New Zealand, being the highest Hotel in the North Island. A range of accommodation and dining for your stay whether it be for a winter adventure in the snow, or a unique hiking experience.

accommodation.name: YHA National Park
accommodation.description: YHA National Park hostel is the closest backpackers to the famous Tongariro Alpine Crossing, near New Zealand’s National Parks of Tongariro and Whanganui and dual World Heritage area.

accommodation.name: Raetihi Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Perfectly located in the Central North Island. We offer affordable accommodation, with communal facilities. We can help you book your canoe adventure on the Whanganui River, mountain bike shuttle and hire, and help you arrange your Ski Holiday.

accommodation.name: The River Lodge Bed & Breakfast and Weddings
accommodation.description: With breathtaking views of Mount Ruapehu and set in world heritage national parks, join us at The River Lodge and experience the essence of this unique location in comfort and style.

accommodation.name: Blue Duck Station
accommodation.description: Located in the Ruapehu district on the banks of the Whanganui and Retaruke rivers and surrounded by Whanganui National Park, Blue Duck Station is an outdoor enthusiast's playground.

accommodation.name: Rua Awa Lodge
accommodation.description: We offer picturesque self contained accommodation on twenty acres of farmland with gardens, orchards, expansive lawns, native bush, cattle, sheep, chickens & views to Mt Ruapehu, Mt Ngauruhoe & Mt Tongariro. We also have direct River access by foot.

accommodation.name: Alexander Motel
accommodation.description: Clean self contained motel units located in a quiet street of SH4 just 20 minutes from The Timber Trail. Close to restaurants and cafes.

accommodation.name: Twin Oaks Lodge
accommodation.description: Twin Oaks Lodge is the perfect place for larger groups. The massive 180m2 of floor space includes 5 bedrooms, huge open plan lounge, kitchen & dining room, separate lounge/games room downstairs, purpose built drying room, 2 bathrooms, deck & carport.

accommodation.name: Waireka Studio
accommodation.description: Waireka Studio is an accommodation option for up to 2 persons. A combined living bedroom space with queen size bed. Kitchenette for tea and coffee making. Lounge chairs and dining table and of course our famous fresh baked bread.

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Country Lodge
accommodation.description: Ruapehu Country Lodge offers boutique, quality, bed and breakfast accommodation in the heart of the North Island's greatest outdoor adventure playground.

accommodation.name: Snowy Waters Lodge
accommodation.description: On the doorstep of Tongariro & Whanganui National Parks, Snowy Waters is a renovated Nurses Home with tonnes of character set within 5 acres of parklike grounds.

accommodation.name: The Park Hotel
accommodation.description: Hotel at Tongariro National Park. Friendly atmosphere. Lovely restaurant & bar, fireplace, warm ambience. Views of Tongariro National Park volcanoes. Ideal Tongariro Crossing & Transport, hiking & mountain biking. Mt Ruapehu sights, ski & board.

accommodation.name: Ohakune Court Motel
accommodation.description: Situated in a quiet, secure location Ohakune Court Motel is within walking distance to the town centre and the ideal choice if you want to explore the wider Waiouru, Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Omaka Lodge
accommodation.description: Situated only 7km from the friendly township of Taumarunui, down the incredible Forgotten World Highway, lies Omaka Lodge, a boutique bed & breakfast venue in the heart of New Zealand’s Forgotten World.

accommodation.name: 2 Nights Spa Retreat at Mt Ruapehu
accommodation.description: Indulge yourselves with a two nights Spa Retreat at Mt Ruapehu.

accommodation.name: Tukino Lodge - Tukino Alpine Sports Club
accommodation.description: Tukino Lodge is owned and operated by the Tukino Alpine Sports Club. One of three lodges at Tukino Ski Field on the eastern slopes of Mt Ruapehu. We provide affordable and comfortable accommodation on the mountain for our members and guests.

accommodation.name: Howard's Mountain Lodge
accommodation.description: Howards Mountain Lodge is one of National Parks most iconic accommodation providers.  With our proximity to the Tongariro National Park and Ruapehu ski facilities, we can cater for all recreational guests.   Hiking and Biking in summer, skiing winter

accommodation.name: BachOneNine
accommodation.description: Welcome to Bach One Nine, a stylish, self-contained holiday retreat in the heart of Ohakune. Bach One Nine offers comfortable, contemporary accommodation with a touch of Kiwiana. Relax in the cosy lounge and watch a DVD while the kids watch a movie.

accommodation.name: Bradley's Garden BnB
accommodation.description: We offer you a private fully self contained cottage that exudes elegance and comfort. The rural farming back drop whilst only 3km from Taumarunui, provides the most peaceful quiet environment for you to relax.

accommodation.name: Waireka Apartment
accommodation.description: A quiet fully equipped self contained apartment including spa pool and breakfast for your total relaxation.

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Chalet Rentals
accommodation.description: Need accommodation? At Ruapehu Chalet Rentals, we have a large selection of chalets and/or holiday houses that are all available for rental. Stay a week or a weekend.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Tongariro Holiday Park is in a great location with a large range of accommodation types. Located between the start and finish points of the Tongariro Alpine Crossing. Also just a 25 min drive up to the car parks of the Whakapapa ski field.

accommodation.name: Adventure Motel
accommodation.description: Gillian and John welcome you to our area, we are happy to recommend and assist with planning your visit to the Mt Ruapehu or the Tongariro National Park. we have a small motel off the main highway in Tongariro National Park Village

accommodation.name: Plateau Lodge
accommodation.description: Alpine style lodge with Apartments, Ensuites, Lodge rooms and Studios on the door step to the Dual Heritage Tongariro National Park. Daily shuttles to the Tongariro Alpine Crossing and Northern Circuit at 6am-7am-8am-9am-10am.

accommodation.name: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel & Cottage
accommodation.description: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel is the ideal place to stay in the Central North Island. It is situated in pleasant, park-like surroundings just 1km from Ohakune Township.

accommodation.name: Timber Trail Lodge
accommodation.description: Deep in the centre of the North Island, right in the middle of nowhere, the Timber Trail Lodge is a very special place. It provides full service comfort to bike riders on the Timber Trail and other visitors to the wilderness of Pureora Forest Park.

accommodation.name: Kakahi Adventure Lodge
accommodation.description: Kakahi Adventure Lodge is a holiday home / fishing lodge that has been open to the public for 7 years. It is owned and operated by Maxine and Mike, who live next door, and extensive local and historical knowledge which they will happily share.

accommodation.name: Ohakune Homestay
accommodation.description: Homestay accommodation - 2 queen and 1 king single. All rooms have en-suite facilities. Situated on quiet country road with mountain views - only five minutes drive from Ohakune.

accommodation.name: Taylor Lodge
accommodation.description: A secluded accommodation, located off SH4 between Ohakune and National Park. Surrounded by nature it’s an ideal spot for all your outdoor adventures. Whether it be hitting the ski fields, cruising on the mountain bike, or hiking the trails.

accommodation.name: The Hobbit Motorlodge
accommodation.description: Quality accommodation in peaceful surroundings. We offer self contained and serviced accommodation with facilities rich in warmth and character and that special touch that makes you feel at home.

accommodation.name: The Gingerbread House Ohakune
accommodation.description: Perfect for a family getaway or a ski trip with friends, this simply gorgeous Ohakune home enjoys lovely mountain views and will transport you right into a snowy fairytale. Welcome to The Gingerbread House.

accommodation.name: Adventure Lodge
accommodation.description: Ron and Lorraine welcome you to our area, we are happy to recommend and assist with planning your visit to the Tongariro National Park. You can enjoy a hearty breakfasts, transfers to theTongariro Alpine Crossing with a packed lunch and dinner.

accommodation.name: The Peaks Motor Inn
accommodation.description: If you are visiting Tongariro National Park, Tongariro Crossing and Mt Ruapehu, or Turoa Ski fields then Ohakune has everything you need, and the best accommodation in Ohakune is "The Peaks Motor Inn".

accommodation.name: Mountain Heights Lodge
accommodation.description: Mountain Heights Lodge provides comfortable accommodation options including bed and breakfast and self contained motel units for travellers wishing to stay in the Mt Ruapehu and Tongariro National Park & is an excellent location to explore the area.

accommodation.name: Te Awa Glamping
accommodation.description: A riverside haven, Te Awa Glamping is an immersive experience that allows you to forget the world through relaxation and recreation.

accommodation.name: Tongariro at Makotuku Bed and Breakfast
accommodation.description:
Tongariro at Makotuku, at the foot of Mount Ruapehu. One or two bedrooms available in a private wing of our new rural home. 
Ten minutes north of Ohakune and Raetihi, 15 minutes south of National Park. A gateway to Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Bombardino Chalet
accommodation.description: Bombardino Chalet - A mountain retreat with Spa. Bombardino Chalet is a brand new architecturally designed holiday home located in the heart of Ohakune very close to the main coffees, restaurants, bars and shops.

accommodation.name: Kings Ohakune Accommodation
accommodation.description: Iconic and historic, Kings is a relaxing place to get away and enjoy great outdoor adventures. Open all year round with busier Winter and Summer. Kings has cozy en-suite rooms, 2 spa pools, an onsite restaurant bar with great views of Mount Ruapehu.

accommodation.name: Camp Epic
accommodation.description: Camp Epic - An Epic Camping Experience. Located within the stunning Pureora Forest Park, Camp Epic is made for those who love to experience the beauty of the outdoors, but with those essential luxuries.

accommodation.name: Whakapapa Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Set in native bush on majestic Mount Ruapehu in the heart of Tongariro National Park. Campervan and tent sites, standard cabins (beds only) and a 32 bed backpackers lodge, also available as a self-contained lodge.

accommodation.name: Cairnbrae House
accommodation.description: Homelike tranquility with guests privacy and comfort in mind. Breakfast included. Free off road parking. Free Wifi.

accommodation.name: Rocky Mountain Chalets
accommodation.description: Soak in our hot spa, Unwind in our peaceful sauna & Relax in natural surroundings. Rocky Mountain Chalets is situated in an easy walk from cafés, restaurants and supermarkets, yet in a peaceful, natural environment.

accommodation.name: Blackfern Lodge
accommodation.description: Luxury rustic accommodation, a unique one stop experience amidst the warmth & wonders of New Zealand's natural beauty & history. Timber Trail Packages - All inclusive options available.

accommodation.name: Station Lodge - Group Accommodation
accommodation.description: Book exclusive use of Station Lodge for hosting large groups providing a substantial holiday home type feel, with an outstanding setting for family reunions, school groups, weddings, corporate functions & weekend escapes, sleeping up to 36 guests.

accommodation.name: Alpine Chalets Tongariro
accommodation.description: The Alpine Chalets in National Park Village offer a comfortable and affordable stay with outstanding panoramic views of Mt Ruapehu, Mt Ngauruhoe and Mt Tongariro in Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Retaruke Country Estate
accommodation.description: Just a bit unique. Enjoy exclusive use of this authentic country lodge set in 4000 acres of farm and bush west of National Park. Relax and enjoy pure peace and quiet or indulge in the outstanding outdoor experiences this stunning property offers.

accommodation.name: Ranfurly Cottage
accommodation.description: Ranfurly Cottage is a boutique B&B situated on the edge of historic Raeithi Village looking towards Ruapehu's stunning volcanic peak, Tongariro National Park and a stones throw from the Whanganui River.

accommodation.name: The Inn At The Convent
accommodation.description: Receive a warm welcome when you arrive at this beautiful old converted Convent. Each room is unique and you will enjoy a relaxing stay in this quiet area. Continental breakfast is first class and will set you up for the day.

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Mountain Motel and Lodge
accommodation.description: Calling all who are looking to have some FUN IN THE SNOW. The Winter season is here! Are you looking for amazing, affordable accommodation for your ski trip to Mount Ruapehu region? We are situated in the ideal location of Ohakune NZ's mountain town.

accommodation.name: Station Lodge Chalets
accommodation.description: Station Lodge offers three self-contained private stand alone Luxury Chalets, complete with private spa pool.

accommodation.name: Triple Peaks Eco Lodge - National Park Holiday Home
accommodation.description: Triple Peaks Lodge is an upmarket 5 bedroom 2 bathroom National Park holiday house. This modern holiday house enjoys expansive decking, spacious living areas, and stunning views overlooking Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Alpine Motel & Backpackers  Lodge
accommodation.description: Alpine Motel, Backpackers is located in Ohakune's town centre, close to shops, bars & cafes. Ohakune is the closest town to the Turoa & Whakapapa Skifields, it adjoins New Zealand's only World Heritage Park Tongariro National Park.

eatDrinkShop.name: Jasmine's Thai Restaurant & Café
eatDrinkShop.description: Check out their fantastic breakfast, lunch and dinner options.

eatDrinkShop.name: Wild Forest Collective
eatDrinkShop.description: We are a Wild mix of apothecary, clothing, home-decor, selfcare products, services, workshops, classes and more.
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Wild Forest Collective Clothing Rack 2 - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: Solvej Swings
eatDrinkShop.description: Solvej Swings are timeless canvas and wooden swings skilfully crafted from the best suited quality materials right here in Ruapehu

eatDrinkShop.name: Awhi Honey
eatDrinkShop.description: With Manuka as far as the eye can see in places it is no wonder Ruapehu produces so much quality Manuka Honey

eatDrinkShop.name: Storm Shelter Cafe
eatDrinkShop.description: Cozy cafe in Ohakune with great coffee, milkshakes, soups , toasties and more

eatDrinkShop.name: Sweet Squares
eatDrinkShop.description: Seriously indulgent brownies with loaded toppings

eatDrinkShop.name: Shear Warmth
eatDrinkShop.description: Shear Warmth are the only company making traditional woollen blankets completely in New Zealand from lambs wool traced back to the farm.

eatDrinkShop.name: Struan Toymakers
eatDrinkShop.description: It's not easy to keep kids entertained at the moment, but Struan Toys can definately help.

eatDrinkShop.name: Odettas Kitchen
eatDrinkShop.description: Odettas TV dinners is a plant based focused pre made meals to go kinda place.

eatDrinkShop.name: Kombi Coffee
eatDrinkShop.description: Funky pop up coffee and juice bar in Ohakune during the winter season. Stop in and check it out!

eatDrinkShop.name: Elemento Ruapehu
eatDrinkShop.description: Come and meet Allie and grab yourself some delicious kai

eatDrinkShop.name: Four Square, Raetihi
eatDrinkShop.description: We're proud to be part of the long-standing iconic Kiwi brand that has been the local for New Zealand communities since 1924.

eatDrinkShop.name: Studio 85
eatDrinkShop.description: Original Artworks, T-shirts, prints and ceramics in Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: The Bakehouse Cafe
eatDrinkShop.description: Offering a really good choice of food and drinks and good customer service to go with it.

eatDrinkShop.name: Industry Bar & Grill
eatDrinkShop.description: Industry Bar & Grill offers a diverse selection of globally inspired cuisine to tempt an array of pallets.

eatDrinkShop.name: Ethical Waste Secondhand Store
eatDrinkShop.description: Ethical Waste are gate keepers that stands in front of the Landfill waste stream then develop a Secondhand store with it.

eatDrinkShop.name: Rustic Eating House
eatDrinkShop.description: What a great place to visit and enjoy great food, meals that are tasty and lovely friendly staff.

eatDrinkShop.name: The Craft Haus
eatDrinkShop.description: Merino clothing store, espresso bar, craft brewery.
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Couple shopping for clothing at Opus Fresh Ohakune - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: Taumarunui RSA Club Restaurant
eatDrinkShop.description: A full Restaurant with an A la Carte Menu

eatDrinkShop.description: Boutique Eatery & Coffee cart located in beautiful Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: New World Taumarunui
eatDrinkShop.description: New World Taumarunui has proudly been serving our community for over 30 years.

eatDrinkShop.name: Johnny Nation's Chocolate Eclair Shop
eatDrinkShop.description: World famous eclairs in New Zealand's Mountain town.
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Girl eating chocolatea eclair from Johnny Nations Chocolate Eclair Shop Ohakune -Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: The Station Cafe
eatDrinkShop.description: The Station Café, Bar and Restaurant in National Park, New Zealand is situated in the historic railway station.
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/The Station Cafe National Park - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: The Kitchen
eatDrinkShop.description: We offer delicious and affordable fusion style food with a wide range of drinks.

eatDrinkShop.name: Thorn Ohakune
eatDrinkShop.description: Small Coffee and food container with a big attitude  Takeaway Food, Cafes, Ohakune

eatDrinkShop.name: La Pizzeria
eatDrinkShop.description: Ohakunes Most Famous Pizza Restaurant

eatDrinkShop.name: SAPS Gifts and Souvenirs
eatDrinkShop.description: Gifts, souvenirs, toasted sandwiches, coffee as well as some amazing local carvings.  Shopping, Cafes, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: Osteria
eatDrinkShop.description: Osteria is a superb Italian Restaurant, located in our beautiful North Island location Ohakune.  Restaurants, Takeaway Food, Ohakune

eatDrinkShop.name: Ohakune Tavern
eatDrinkShop.description: A family friendly place where you can eat good food, be relaxed and cozy next to two fire places or enjoy a game of rugby with mates.  Bars, Restaurants, Ohakune

eatDrinkShop.name: Angel Louise Café
eatDrinkShop.description: Friendly and relaxing atmosphere.  Cafes, Restaurants, Raetihi

eatDrinkShop.name: TCB Ski Board Bike
eatDrinkShop.description: Ohakune's top Ski, Board and Bike retail, rental and workshop.  Shopping, Ohakune

eatDrinkShop.name: Monsoon Indian Cuisine Taumarunui
eatDrinkShop.description: Unique culinary experiences make for great, everlasting memories.  Restaurants, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: National Park 4 Square & GAS
eatDrinkShop.description: Anything and everything you could need on your road trip or holiday.

eatDrinkShop.name: Twin Rivers Gallery Shop & Studio
eatDrinkShop.description: The Taumarunui Art Group & Twin Rivers Gallery Shop & Studio is a collective of artists based in the King Country who foster arts & crafts in the community.  Shopping, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: The Tussock Bar & Restaurant
eatDrinkShop.description: Relax with an open fireplace, live sports TV and a spacious outdoor deck for soaking up the evening sunset over Mount Ngauruhoe.  Cafes, Restaurants, Bars, Whakapapa Village

eatDrinkShop.name: Schnapps Bar, Restaurant & Minigolf
eatDrinkShop.description: Great views, great food and great fun minigolf.  Restaurants, Bars, National Park

eatDrinkShop.name: Skotel Alpine Resort Restaurant & Bar
eatDrinkShop.description: Showcase of New Zealand local produce including a full a la carte menu  Restaurants, Bars, Whakapapa Village
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Skotel Alpine Resort Restaurant & Bar - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: Kings Bar and Burger Saloon
eatDrinkShop.description: Some of the best food in Ohakune  Ohakune
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Kings Bar and Burger Saloon - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch

eatDrinkShop.name: Volcano Vibe Collective
eatDrinkShop.description: Bringing together art, passion and a shared goal for connectedness.  Shopping, Raetihi

eatDrinkShop.name: Chateau Tongariro Sunday Roast Buffet
eatDrinkShop.description: Come enjoy a slice of tradition at the Sunday Carvery  Restaurants, Whakapapa Village

eatDrinkShop.name: Four Square, Taumarunui
eatDrinkShop.description: We're proud to be part of the long-standing iconic Kiwi brand that has been the local for New Zealand communities since 1924.  Shopping, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: The Mess Tent
eatDrinkShop.description: National Army Museum's new military themed cafe and dining experience  Cafes, Takeaway Food, Waiouru

eatDrinkShop.name: Strange Dog Print and Design
eatDrinkShop.description: We’re a one-stop shop for design, printing, and giftware.  Shopping, Ohakune

eatDrinkShop.name: Golden Kiwi
eatDrinkShop.description: Fish n Chips in Taumarunui.  Takeaway Food, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: The Art Studio and Gallery
eatDrinkShop.description: Original artworks in oils and acrylics  Shopping, Taumarunui

eatDrinkShop.name: The Ruapehu Restaurant
eatDrinkShop.description: The finest ambience & all the sophistication expected of the Chateau’s elegant traditions .

eatDrinkShop.name: The Blind Finch
eatDrinkShop.description: Bake House by day and gourmet burgers by night.  Takeaway Food, Ohakune
eatDrinkShop.image: https://www.visitruapehu.com/media/Magnificent burgers from the Blind Finch in Ohakune - Visit Ruapehu.jpg?width=320&height=180&rmode=stretch
